title: An unhandled exception has occurred
author: klngh
body_snippet:
This exception will force mRemoteNG to close. Cannot access a disposed object. Object name: 'ConnectionWindow'.

## Expected Behavior
Reporting a bug. When closing a saved SSH connection window, the window should close.


## Current Behavior
When closing a saved SSH connection window, an unhandled exception has occurred window pops up and force closes mRemoteNG. See error below:

   at System.Windows.Forms.Control.MarshaledInvoke(Control caller, Delegate method, Object[] args, Boolean s...

iterations.description: Verified ObjectDisposedException crash when closing SSH connection window — protocol fires Prot_Event_Closed after ConnectionWindow is already disposed, causing unhandled exception that terminates the app.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Verified ObjectDisposedException crash when closing SSH connection window — protocol fires Prot_Event_Closed after ConnectionWindow is already disposed, causing unhandled exception that terminates the app.
Approach: In Prot_Event_Closed, add IsDisposed/Disposing guard before Control.Invoke so the callback is silently ignored if the window was already disposed during closure.
